page.title: 16A Day at Daneswood School.
page.content: For transport we use my dad's car because he is the headteacher of my school. Every morning we set off from Cutthorpe at ten minutes to eight to travel the seventeen miles to Skegby. I come into school at about twenty to nine to put out the hymn books for assembly. After this we have maths until morning break. After break it might be swimming, drama or language work. Then it is lunchtime. Some children have a cooked lunch and some of them bring sandwiches. After lunch it might be P.E. where we have as chance to run about and let off a little steam. After P.E. it is always "Singing Together" which is really boring. Then we normally have topic work or English or we might have games. We do not have a break in the afternoon but we do finish quite early at twenty past three.
